Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder of brown pottery ribbed vessel, the interior is lightly covered with a brown-yellow resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394106) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394106)
